name: Personality Compass
description: Discover your personality type across 4 key dimensions!

answers.text: Have deep conversations with a few people
Observe and listen more than talk
Energize the room and keep things fun

questions.text: When making decisions, you rely more on...

answers.text: A mix of both, depending on the situation
Have a detailed plan before starting
Keep your options open and adapt
Have a loose plan with room for spontaneity
Create schedules and stick to them

questions.text: When learning something new, you prefer...

answers.text: Understanding the theory and concepts first

questions.text: After a long day, you recharge by...

answers.text: Calling a close friend to chat

questions.text: In a conflict, you tend to...

answers.text: Focus on finding the truth and fair solution
Try to avoid the conflict entirely

archetypeResults.title: The Debater
archetypeResults.description: Quick-witted and bold, you love intellectual challenges and have endless curiosity. You're not afraid to challenge established ideas and thrive in dynamic environments where you can explore new possibilities.
archetypeResults.shareText: I'm The Debater! Quick-witted, bold, and endlessly curious. What's your personality type?

archetypeResults.title: The Architect
archetypeResults.description: Strategic and determined, you have a natural ability to see the big picture and create long-term plans. Your analytical mind and independence make you a natural problem-solver.
archetypeResults.shareText: I'm The Architect! Strategic, determined, and always planning ahead. What's your personality type?

archetypeResults.title: The Campaigner
archetypeResults.description: Enthusiastic and creative, you see life as full of possibilities. Your warmth and energy inspire others, and you have a natural talent for connecting with people and causes you believe in.
archetypeResults.shareText: I'm The Campaigner! Enthusiastic, creative, and full of possibilities. What's your personality type?

archetypeResults.title: The Advocate
archetypeResults.description: Idealistic and principled, you have a deep desire to help others and make the world a better place. Your insight and determination make you a powerful force for positive change.
archetypeResults.shareText: I'm The Advocate! Idealistic, principled, and driven to help others. What's your personality type?

archetypeResults.title: The Executive
archetypeResults.description: Organized and dedicated, you're a natural leader who values order and tradition. Your practical approach and strong work ethic make you excellent at managing projects and people.
archetypeResults.shareText: I'm The Executive! Organized, dedicated, and a natural leader. What's your personality type?

archetypeResults.title: The Adventurer
archetypeResults.description: Artistic and sensitive, you experience the world through your senses and emotions. Your spontaneous nature and appreciation for beauty make you creative and in tune with the present moment.
archetypeResults.shareText: I'm The Adventurer! Artistic, sensitive, and living in the moment. What's your personality type?

archetypeResults.title: The Entrepreneur
archetypeResults.description: Bold and practical, you're all about action and results. Your energy and sharp perception make you excellent at reading situations and seizing opportunities as they arise.
archetypeResults.shareText: I'm The Entrepreneur! Bold, practical, and action-oriented. What's your personality type?

archetypeResults.title: The Mediator
archetypeResults.description: Poetic and kind, you're guided by your principles and desire for harmony. Your imagination and empathy allow you to see the good in people and situations others might miss.
archetypeResults.shareText: I'm The Mediator! Poetic, kind, and guided by principles. What's your personality type?
